Title: Provides a fine for a person responsible for a trailer or semitrailer parked or left unattended in New York city
Summary: Provides a fine of one thousand dollars for a person responsible for a trailer or semitrailer parked or left unattended in a city with a population of one million or more; makes certain exceptions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1204, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to a fine for parked or unattended semitrailers or trailers on streets of a city with a population of one million or more
